name: Shogi Saikyou II: Jissen Taikyoku Hen
overview: Shogi Saikyou II: Jissen Taikyoku Hen ("The Strongest Shogi II: Battle Game Volume", where taikyoku refers to the playing of board games in particular) is a shogi game for the Super Famicom and the sequel to the 1995 game Shogi Saikyou. Shogi Saikyou II presents a number of scenarios which were left in the middle of a game, and the player can take them over and win. After winning these scenarios, more challenging ones become unlocked.
